uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize

Class RegionUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.RegionUtility

  • public class RegionUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for generating regions. This class assigns indices to the variable and produces parikh vectors that reach a given state from the initial state.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Method Detail

      • getEventIndex

        public int getEventIndex(java.lang.String event)
        Get the index of the given event.
        Parameters:
        event - The event whose index should be returned.
        Returns:
        The event's index or -1.

      • getEventList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEventList()
        Get the list of events of the underlying transition system. This list is ordered to form vectors. So the first entry of a vector corresponds to the first event in this list etc.
        Returns:
        The event list

      • getNumberOfEvents

        public int getNumberOfEvents()
        Get the number of events.
        Returns:
        The number of events.

        Get the spanning tree on which this RegionUtility operates.
        Returns:
        The spanning tree

      • getTransitionSystem

        public TransitionSystem getTransitionSystem()
        Get the transition system on which this RegionUtility operatores.
        Returns:
        The transition system

      • getReachingParikhVector

        public java.util.List<java.math.BigInteger> getReachingParikhVector(State node)
                                                             throws UnreachableException
        Parameters:
        node - The node whose Parikh vector should be returned.
        Returns:
        The Parikh vector that reaches the node from the initial state.
        Throws:
        UnreachableException - if the given state is unreachable from the initial state

      • getParikhVectorForEdge

        public java.util.List<java.math.BigInteger> getParikhVectorForEdge(Arc edge)
                                                            throws UnreachableException
        Get the Parikh vector for an edge. This Parikh vector is Psi_t = Psi_s + e_i - Psi_{s'} for an edge t = s--[a_i]->s'.
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge to examine.
        Returns:
        The edge's Parikh vector or an empty list if none exists.
        Throws:
        UnreachableException - if the given state is unreachable from the initial state

      • getRegionBasis

        public java.util.List<Region> getRegionBasis()
        Calculate a basis of abstract regions for the LTS that this region utility belongs to. This calculates a basis of abstract regions via proposition 6.14 from "Petri Net Synthesis" by Badouel, Bernardinello and Darondeau. All regions on the LTS are a linear combinations of the elements in the basis.
        Returns:
        The region basis.
